reviews.review:
Maravilhoso!
História envolvente, tem modo desafio para jogadores mais experientes.
O multiplayer poderia ser maior. :/

Игра классная, хоть я прошёл её совсем недавно, Valve очень круто постарались над этой игрой. Рекомендую тем, кто хочет славно поломать себе голову, а если вы прошли сюжетку на изи, советую вам взять с собой друга и идти проходить кооп режим. Так же советую заценить тестовые камеры сообщества, и по желанию создать свою). Единственный минус, по моему субъективному мнению, это то, что некоторые классные тестовые камеры и фичи так и не вышли с релизом игры(. Но я думаю, что вы не заскучаете во время прохождения этой игры. Возможности Source действительно впечатляют. Рекомендую)

Para quem esse jogo foi desenvolvido?
( ) Espermatozóides.
( ) Crianças.
( X) Tudo e todos.
( ) Adolescentes
( ) Adultos.
( ) Dementes.

Texturas, Gráficos, Lindeza?
( ) 220 x 120p.
( ) Meia boca, tem piores.
( ) Dentro da média atual.
( X) Bonito e agradável.
( ) Nem meu olho não aguenta essa qualidade incrivel.

Bugs.
( ) O jogo em si é uma falha.
( ) Bug pra todo lado, tipo tiro em favela no Rio.
( ) Muitos bugs mas dá pra jogar.
( ) Bugs que não atrapalham.
(X ) Sem bugs notáveis.

É difícil?
( ) Basta assisitr o jogo.
( ) Da pra zerar jogando num Volante..
( X) Padrão, bem de boa.
( ) Bem desafiador, as vezes difícil.
( ) Muito Dificil.
( ) Dark Souls

Duração do jogo base.
( ) Deu Play, ja acabou 3 vezes
( ) Piscou, acabou.
( ) 2 horinhas.
( ) Entre 6-12 Horas<------ Modo História
( ) Muito tempo, no minimo umas 30 horas
(X ) Até enjoar do jogo

História.
( ) Sem História (o interessante é fazer a sua)
( ) História infantil
( ) tem história só pra não dizer que não tem.
( ) Dá pra gostar da história, se esforçando .
(X ) Cuidado pra não se apaixonar.
( ) Dava pra fazer uns 2 livros enormes!!

Músicas.
( ) Joga sem a música
( ) Da pra escutar, no baixo...
( ) Da pra escutar para dormir
(X ) Boa.
( ) Os caras capricharam no áudio.
( ) Baixe a Playlist pra escutar no ônibus.

Hardware Necessário. 60fps
( ) Computador da minha vó.
( X) Tendo uma GPU ja ta rodando.
( ) Nada que uma 1030 não resolva.
( ) Uns 4k em um PC é muito pra você?
( ) Nem pc da nasa aguenta.

Para melhor Experiência.
( ) Desinstala pra recuperar a dignidade.
(X ) O jogo é Offline.<------Modo História
( X) SinglePlayer.<-----Temos o Modo Online
(X ) Coop.
( X) Multiplayer.<-----O Coop é Multiplayer

Vale a pena o investimento?
( ) Era melhor eu ter comprado um lanche.
( ) Melhor esperar uma promoção.
(X ) Se pagou (10 conto na promo)
( ) Pagaria o dobro.
( ) Vale mais que 1/4 do meu rim
Es ist einfach ein cooles spiel mit so viel drin dazu noch eine fantastische geschichte! Es zu Kaufen lohnt sich!!!

I love this game so much I purchased it again (previously played on Xbox 360).  This game is just as perfect as the original and the co-op is very well done.  If you enjoy adventure games, murderous humor, and testing, you would probably really enjoy this game.  Also, there may be cake.
Хороший сюжет и впрочем хорошая игруля, заставляет поразмыслить мозгами в некоторых местах. Время потраченое на нее потрачено не напрасно)

Топчик/
Но меня точно должно начинать тошнить если долго прыгать вниз по порталам из одного в другой?
(эт шутка если что)

Очень интересная игра, одиночку проходил за 3-часа :D (Дуо чуть больше времени)
Советую купить и поиграть.
Очень затягивает.

This game is AWESOME! I play it in coop very often, but it NEVER gets boring! 
Except when you play bad comunitycreated levels. This is most times not the case.



I play this game since 1-2 Years, and I am very happy that I bought it!



If your interested in coop or single player puzzle games you should 
buy this.
i find this game is good

I just love this game so much It's been in my childhood and It's not going to fade.

It's actually fun even after all those years and you can have fun constantly with the Coop campain or even with the workshop maps wich you can create yourself very easily with a build in maps creator and not with any external programs. But if you are hoping for a good logic game with a story you are going to love Portal 2 is a good choice
Игрушка топчик! Мультиплеер тоже! Всё понравилось
holy shit. it is a realy good game. but i dont think the story is so good if you not have played the first game
great game but gives me a headace

没事玩一玩，防止老年痴呆。
最好多人，因为单人玩遇到过不去的就不想玩了

Fantastic game! One of the best I've ever played.  Played through Portal 1 and 2, and by the end of Portal 2 I actually felt bad (and cried) for GLaDos, the AI that's been oppressing you since the beginning of Portal 1. Incredible story arc, great voice acting (I LOVE Stephen Merchant from the Office), and just overall good gameplay.  The game mechanics were incredibly original and thought out, and build upon one another.  11/10
only played it for a little bit i would recommend tho

Great game, but I didn't like the boss battle in Portal 2 as much as I liked it in the first one. Also, the "non test" levels became a bit tedious in the middle of the game. Overall recommended though.
эта игра просто супер! хотя лучше покупать набор с 1 и 2 portal потому-что в первом portal вас научат играть а во втором обучение фиговое так что покупайте набор со скидкой 25% поке ещё она есть!
One of the best games ever made.  I can't believe it took me this long to finish it.

The puzzles are extremely fun to solve. The humor is really great as is the acting. The story is mysterious and the game leaves you hints for the big reveal at the end. There are lots of twists and turns that you wouldn't expect. Overall, one of my favorite games.
Una obra absolutamente maravillosa, junto con Portal 1 son una cita obligada del mundo del arte digital
Te sientes literal dentro del juego, la historia y graficos son impresionantes ademas de tiene un excelente multiplayer. Recomendado 10/10, entonces que esperas? es de valve, es bueno.
This game is incredible. The only reason it isn't better than the first one is because it's the 2nd one.
Oynaması hem basit hem de güzel. Radyolarda şifreler var, gizli odaları var. Bir de dis atan robotumuz var.

Legit this right here, this is Valves magnum opus. Half life 1 and 2 (especially 2) have many problems that just don't make it anywhere near as polished, entertaining, fun and imaginative as Portal 1. Portal 2 however, no game will ever reach the absolute limits this game reached and fucked to the moon. Literally without a doubt the greatest game ever made, with the funniest dialogue ever written, with the greatest characters ever created, with a style that will surpass the ages, a charm found within no other. 

This is art.
this game is the most amazing game in the universe.
A truly first rate game in both 1 and 2 player. Its two player mode is the most fun I've ever had on a computer.
I mean its portal whats not to like
Gotta play the first one first, but this game is amazing in many ways. Puzzle platforming and story rich.
I really enjoy this game because it puts my thinking skills to the test. The puzzles in the game make me really think.

Der Story Mode ist ein Klassiker. Muss man mal gespielt haben!
Den Co-Op Modus mit nem Kumpel zusammen spielen ist auch nice.

Oyunu bitirmiş bulunmaktayım, oyuna tek kelime ile bayıldım. Kesinlikle oynanması gereken bir oyun. Arkadaş olsun, tek başınıza olsun illaki bitirin. İlk oynadığımda arkadaşımla oynamıştım daha sonra soloya başlayayım dedim 3 günde bitti. Oynayın, oynatın :)
это просто хорошо, не надо лишних слов - покупайте, играйте, проходите сингл и кооп и про пользовательские карты не забудьте)
Хорошая игра,как на двоих,так и на одного.
everything this game is amazing everyone who worked on it did an amazing job and would love to see more portal related things in the future and possibly a portal movie???????????
This an amazing puzzle game with great humor, a must play.

This game slams. Puzzles are pleasantly challenging for the most part, some are extra easy, some a little harder, but at no point is it overwhelming.

Well, I really don't need to tell you, it's an old game, you know it or you need to play it, it's that simple.
Amazing Graphics, Gameplay, and Lore/Story. (Gotta love that accent

Whoosh
Portal go Z O O M
funfunfun
kill your friends in co-op
its a great game. playing it will not waste your time at all
A hell of a good game. So much content in one, a single player mode, a co-op mode, and you can even make your own test chambers! 11/10, would buy again.
I LOVE this game they made it amazingly!!

A real classic masterpiece!
Awesome single player campaign, really fun coop multiplayer!
